description:
Two tribes, those of Light and Darkness, have been fighting for a century. On another day of this conflict, the Tribe of Light penetrates deep into enemy territory threatening its very existence...
Meanwhile, the heir apparent of the Tribe of Darkness, Prince http://anidb.net/ch9567 [Astral] deals with a broken heart, after overhearing his fiancé, http://anidb.net/ch9568 [Sharon]`s dissatisfaction with him. She believes him to be a pampered prince incapable of a proper sword fight. Unbeknownst to Sharon, Astral is a decent swordsman, but unable to show it, for his father prevents him from joining the fighting in the front lines out of the fear of losing him. Therefore, Astral sets off to prove his worth by joining the fighting without the permission of his father. However, on his way he comes across the captured enemy princess, http://anidb.net/ch48720 [Maria]...
